ol.li: This protocol applies to all Space employees, contractors and visitors, and all operations including manufacturing facilities, technical centers, offices & administrative buildings where electrical hazards exist. All sites in all regions are expected to develop site specific procedures to comply with this protocol.
Where local legislative requirements are more stringent than this protocol, then the local regulations shall be followed.

Requirements of this protocol will apply to the control of risks associated with electrical hazards in the workplace, to include: working around energized parts, arc flash boundaries, and approach boundaries by outlining safe work practices, personal protective equipment and clothing, installation and labeling requirements, as well as electric tool and cord requirements.
